nodes.text: The Battle of Ko Vari took place during the Great Sith War.

Not much is known about the battle, only that it apparently involved the Galactic Republic fighting against the Krath, within Hutt Space. With the emergence of a Sith cult in the Tapani sector, the Krath signed a non-aggression pact with the Hutts. In response, Republic forces launched a raid on Ko Vari which obliterated the orbiting Krath fleet and devastated much of the planet's surface, depopulating it.
